sentence.Network_en: Haematite is a special case of the more general ilmenite structure.
sentence.Network_cn: 赤铁矿是更为一般的钛铁矿型结构中一个特殊的情况.

sentence.Network_en: The reaction kinetics leading ilmenite directly by acid was investigated.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了盐酸直接浸取钛铁矿的浸取动力学.

sentence.Network_en: Mining ilmenite makes serious surface water pollution, and degenerates ecological environment.
sentence.Network_cn: 钛矿开采严重污染地表水, 并使矿区生态环境普遍退化.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 钛铁矿(Ilmenite)其化学分子式是FeTiO3，Fe 36.8%，Ti 36.6%，O 31.6%。三方晶系。
...在1846年,俄罗斯盖尔曼声称,从黑色钛铁矿,ilmenite,中发现了这个元素,就以这个矿石的名称命名它为ilmenium,并且测定了它的原子量约.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: named after the Ilmen mountains in the Urals + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a weakly magnetic black mineral found in metamorphic and plutonic rocks; an iron titanium oxide in crystalline form; a source of titanium
